The pure class interface. 
public class Item
  extends AnnotatedTerm
The abstract syntax of Z items.

Version: $Id: Item.pizza,v 1.5 1998/09/14 13:48:55 wg Exp $

AxiomaticDef
public case AxiomaticDef(NameDecl[] formals,
                         Expr def);
Axiomatic definition.

Parameters:
formals - the sequence of generic formals this definition depends on.
def - an expression denoting a schema. The names of this schema are introduced as global constants.

Note that schema definitions are treated like abbreviations in Standard Z. In turn, abbreviations are treated as schema text with equational declarations. Henceforth a schema definition such as S =^= E is represented as: 

      AxiomaticDef({}, Expr.Text({Expr.Decl.Eqn("S", "E")}, {}))

FixityDef

public case FixityDef(Fixity fixity);
Fixity definition.

Parameters:
fixity - the fixity being defined.

EmbeddedText

public case EmbeddedText(Text text);
Text object embedded in abstract syntax, containing eg. references, macros, and pragmas.

Parameters:
text - the text object.

ConfigDef

public case ConfigDef(Configuration config);
Configuration definition. mSZ only, inside of class definitions. NOTE: not yet elaborated.

StatechartDef

public case StatechartDef(State root);
Statechart definition. mSZ only, inside of class definitions.

Parameters:
root - the root state.

TransitionDef

public case TransitionDef(NameDecl name,
                          LabelExpr[] reactions);
Named transition definition. mSZ only, inside of class definitions.

Parameters:
name - name of the transition
reactions - a sequence of lable expressions describing the reactions of the transition

StaticReactionDef

public case StaticReactionDef(NameDecl name,
                              LabelExpr[] reactions);
Static reactions. mSZ only, inside of class definitions.

Parameters:
name - the name of the state this static reaction is associated with. null is used for the root state
reactions - a sequence of lable expressions describing the static reactions in the state name

AttributeDef

public case AttributeDef(AttributeKind attrib,
                         NameAppl[] name);
Attribute definition. mSZ only, inside of class definitions.

Parameters:
kind - the kind of attriute
names - the names the attribute is attached to

EnrichDef

public case EnrichDef(NameAppl name);
Enrichment of class. mSZ only, inside of class definitions.

Parameters:
name - name of the enriched class, inclusive of actualizations of formals.

public static class AttributeKind
public static class AttributeKind
  extends Term
Kind of attributes.
